column4: Hello.  I'm new to ubuntu and linux in general.  I'm trying to set some environment variables, and I'm altering /etc/profile with X=Y type statements followed by EXPORT X statements, however upon logoff/logon, the variables aren't persisted.  What am I doing wrong?
you might just want to set trhem in /etc/environment
in there you don't need to do export, just put BLAH=blah
pam will end up setting up the environment before the shell runs
